attributes.additional_details:
De-Privatising public transport with a massive Governmet take over.
To stop private business' charging over the top prices.
The possibility of a government controlled public transport system with a additional tax, so that people can use public transport without having to splash cash upon use.
If people are paying for it they WILL use it
To decrease the amount of cars on the road.
Decreasing the amount of traffic accidents and incidents.
To increase amount of people using the bus and trains.
To create new jobs.
MONEY GOES TO OUR GOVERNMENT AND NOT TO FORIEGN COMPANYS. Boosting economy.
